head.supplied: QUARTERLY ESTIMATE ¶ . ¶ To the Honorable ¶ ¶ the Chief Secretary ¶ Sir, ¶ ¶ I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate ¶ • ¶ of Expenditure during the ¶ ¶ two months ¶ ¶ endin...

div.p: K76/11029, unit 882, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

note.p: MS written by G. Luehmann and signed by M.

div.p: To the Honorable the Chief Secretary

I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate •
of Expenditure during the two months ending October 31st 1 876.

cell.style: border-top: 0.0208in solid #000000; border-left: none; border-bottom: none; border-right: 0.0208in solid #000000; padding-top: 0in; padding-left: 0.0555in; padding-bottom: 0in; padding-right: 0.0555in;

note.p: Each amount in this column has been ticked except the item for 'publication of work' which has been crossed out.
